publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-153 Donald Gorrie: Hamilton School for the Deaf—That the Parliament congratulates Hamilton School for the Deaf, its management, staff, pupils and parents on the positive results it achieved from the recent inspection of the school by Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education; notes that the school is an outstanding example of special educational provision, and believes that high quality special educational schools such as Hamilton School for the Deaf must remain a feature of Scotland’s education system whilst they continue to meet the appropriate educational and social needs of individual pupils.
